title: Pbe
body: Im not too sure how t install the pbe folder, i got accepted and everything but i installed it and it and about 2 hrs later it finished i opened it logged in and closed it. I came back after about another hour and opened the pbe and it tried to install again any insight?

replies.body: Make sure that you are accessing the folder wherever the PBE was saved to, and not the installation folder.  When you opened it for the first time yesterday, it was probably after an automatic launch after install.  There should be a folder specifically for PBE!
